thread.title: Unboxing & Setting Up New IBM PC AT Built in 1988
thread.title_full: Unboxing & Setting Up New IBM PC AT Built in 1988

author: Scott Beale
title: Unboxing & Setting Up New IBM PC AT Built in 1988
text:
Clint of Lazy Game Reviews experiences pure joy as he unboxes and sets up a brand new, factory sealed IBM PC 5170 AT that was built in 1988.
Join me in savoring each piece of retro tech as I set it up with PC-DOS 3.30 and EGA graphics.

Related Laughing Squid Posts Fully Appointed Pirate Ship ‘Gypsy Rose’ For Sale Is This Thing On? 2: The Weird Year, Gallery 1988 & Funny or Die Show Snitter, A Desktop App for Twitter Powered by Adobe AIR
